description: Shirayuki loves to cook, especially for her brother, and is always trying out new recipes for him. She refers to herself in the third-person as "Hime" (姫?), which translates to "princess". This might be because of her name`s Western variant: Snow White. She also frequently ends her sentences with the phrase "desu-no." She addresses her brother as Nii-sama (にいさま?), which is shorter than Sakuya`s, but polite. Her birthday is February 11, is an Aquarian, and stands 140 cm (about 4` 7") in height.
name: Shirayuki
